Package com.myPack

Class AiRotationHelp

java.lang.Object
com.myPack.AiRotationHelp
public class AiRotationHelp
extends java.lang.Object
This is a class to help the computer to find the best rotation possible to get the best result.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AiRotationHelp​(int[][] board)
    The main constructor of this class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int[] answerMe()
    This method will check all the houses and will chose the high score rotation and will give it back.
    int giveTheScore​(int x, int y, int line)
    This will check and find the score of a rotation based on the number of same type balls.
    void goInBoard​(int part, int rotationType)
    This method will rotate a part and will send it to giveTheScore to give this situation a value.
    void rotatePart​(int part, int rotate)
    This method will rotate a part for us.
    void rotateParts()
    This method will rotate each part and then send it to goInBoard for checking.

  • Method Details

    • giveTheScore

      public int giveTheScore​(int x, int y, int line)
      This will check and find the score of a rotation based on the number of same type balls.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      line - the direction
      Returns:
      the score of this situation

    • goInBoard

      public void goInBoard​(int part, int rotationType)
      This method will rotate a part and will send it to giveTheScore to give this situation a value.
      Parameters:
      part - the part we rotate
      rotationType - the type of the rotation

    • rotatePart

      public void rotatePart​(int part, int rotate)
      This method will rotate a part for us.
      Parameters:
      part - the part to rotate
      rotate - the type of the rotation

    • rotateParts

      public void rotateParts()
      This method will rotate each part and then send it to goInBoard for checking.

    • answerMe

      public int[] answerMe()
      This method will check all the houses and will chose the high score rotation and will give it back.
      Returns:
      the rotation
